member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.Culture
member.summary: Allows you to localize the Crosstab provider for language and region specific data.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.DataSource
member.summary: Used to instruct the Crosstab provider to retrieve the information from an external data provider.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.DateFormat
member.summary: Instructs Chart FX how to format the dates when a column specified as a Row Heading is a date.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.NullColumnHeading
member.summary: Instructs Chart FX to use the configured string value when a null column heading is encountered.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.RowHeadingSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to use Row Headings XValues.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.CrosstabDataProvider.Separator
member.summary: Sets the separator between two or more fields that form the point label, when more than one Row Heading is present.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.ListProvider.List
member.summary: Gets or sets an IList object providing access to CollectionBase members used modify the ListProvider list.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.XmlDataProvider.Culture
member.summary: Allows you to localize data for a specific language and region.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.XmlDataProvider.DateFormat
member.summary: Allows you to customize the default date format for the Chart FX XmlDataProvider.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Data.XmlDataProvider.RowValueTag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the xml will include a value tag in rows.

member.summary: Specifies the path to the XML file.
